text:
Opentest (https://www.opentest.co) | San Fracisco, CA | Node/JS Full-Stack Engineer | Full-Time

Opentest empowers individuals and organizations to express themselves and receive feedback in the most powerful medium out there: video. I could type up a long response, but here's a personally recorded video explaining the position in more depth:

https://www.opentest.co/share/ab5acfc03fd811e691848dbb7446da...

Our actual compensation is flexible and we want to work with you to make sure we land on something that we both feel good about.
